long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Six Moves is an exciting game available as a Chrome Extension and can also be played for free on the website retrobowls.org. If you're looking for a challenging and strategic experience, this game is perfect for you.

In Six Moves, your objective is to solve puzzles by strategically moving objects within a limited number of moves. Each level presents a unique puzzle with a variety of objects, obstacles, and goals. Your task is to carefully plan your moves to manipulate the objects and reach the desired outcome.

The gameplay requires critical thinking and problem-solving skills. You must analyze the puzzle, consider the effects of each move, and anticipate the consequences of your actions. With only six moves at your disposal, every decision matters. The game progressively increases in difficulty, introducing new elements and complex puzzles to test your abilities.

How to Play
Push your white block with arrows around the stage to push other blocks into position, creating sets of 3 or more blocks of the same color. Merge until you create a value matching or exceeding the warriors above the board & defeat all the warriors to move onto the next stage.

If you want to play more games, click the "Unblocked Games" button or other games we add links for users to easily find more games on our website: https: //retrobowls.org
